description: A CSS stylesheet for styling a React-based Tic Tac Toe application, defining various CSS variables, layout styles, and component-specific styles such as headers, buttons, and grid layouts.

classes.name: container
classes.description: Styles for the main container of the page, including max width and layout padding.

classes.name: header
classes.description: Styles for the header section, including layout and margin.

classes.name: logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo with specific font and color.

classes.name: search-bar
classes.description: Styles for the search bar, arranging its input and icon.

classes.name: food-grid
classes.description: Grid layout styling for displaying food items.

classes.name: bottom-nav
classes.description: Styles for the bottom navigation bar, including positioning and background.
